description: Mixing a little bit of&nbsp;Campari,&nbsp;gin, and lemon with an egg white creates this most elegant cocktail. The flavor is not too sharp because it has been rounded out by adding this ingredient, giving you that silky texture in your mouth when drinking them!
name: Gin Campari Sour

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker, combine all ingredients.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker, combine all ingredients.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill the shaker with ice and shake well until the egg white is frothy.
